record.title: OFFICIAL 50TH ANNIVERSARY CELEBRATION

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate proceed to the consideration of S. Res. 219, submitted earlier today.

record.chair: The clerk will report the resolution by title.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the resolution be agreed to the preamble be agreed, and the motion to reconsider be laid upon the table.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
